entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled. #61642
  • Private Property incorrectly marked as unused in VB.NET VS 2022 IDE0051 #61640
  • Shift+Alt+F10 for adding missing using directives does not always work inside csharp XML documentation comments #61639
  • Can't add semi-colon to end of line #61638
  • Add EditAndContinueMethodDebugInformation.Create overload that takes compressedStateMachineStateMap #61636
  • CodeGenerator.TryEmitReadonlySpanAsBlobWrapper - doesn't record dependencies from UseSiteInfo for utilized well known methods #61631
  • Code cleanup (C#) with new line preferences doesn't remove all empty lines #61629
  • Show where a thrown error may be caught, akin to find usages. #61628
  • Add convert unused parameter to discard to code cleanup #61627
  • Add 'automatically remove closing curly bracket when corresponding opening curly bracket has been removed' feature #61626
  • Warning to programmer about sync Task return in c# #61625

Closed

  • Building skeleton assemblies appears to be much more expensive now that we have generators. #61226
    Compiler.Next
  • Language version check is missing for an implicit implementation of a static virtual member #61598
    C# 11.0
  • Possible race in an Assert recently added to Compilation.GetTypeByMetadataName #59395
    17.3
  • API Additions for Required Members #61444
    C# 11.0
  • Local named "required" in top-level statements #61510
    C# 11.0
  • Revise `FindImplementationForInterfaceMember` for abstract statics #60704
    17.3
  • Test `SourceGeneration.SyntaxAwareGeneratorTests.Syntax_Provider_Doesnt_Attribute_Incorrect_Timing` is flaky #61540
  • Getting Speculative SemanticModel for method body method declaration without body (block or expression) is impossible #61564
  • xml doc `cref` can't disambiguate types based on visibility like method body can #61478
  • Use shift mask for shift operations with native integers #43347
    17.3
  • Need to make CodeLens tagger not tag files that are not visible. #60651
    17.3
  • Create Find-References API overload that allows searching for references to multiple symbols at once. #60984
    17.3
  • `cref` block is disallowed when the referenced member of type contains any unconstrainted generic argument with nullable annotation #61076
    Backlog
  • Unable to evaluate an outer constant inside a local function #61624
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Cache the AssemblyMetadata produced for any given compilation #61645
    Area-IDE
  • Emit error when function pointer invocation is encountered in an expression tree #61644
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Function Pointers
  • Calculate containing type effective accessibility for required member enforcement #61643
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Mention sharplab in bug template #61637
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation
  • Semantic Snippets - Fix bug where trigger character and start of snippet intersect #61633
    Area-IDE
  • Update compiler to supported UnmanagedMemoryStream when creating ModuleMetadata. #61630
    Area-IDE
  • Reducing allocations in completion #61620
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Perform language version check for an implicit implementation of a static virtual member #61601
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Simplify the code for synchronizing the workspace with OOP. #61634
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61641
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61623
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove obsolete external access API now that intellicode has switched over #61635
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Move the semantics checks of Inheritance margin to OOP #61592
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, Next
  • Update "file types" branch from main #61610
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update comment #61614
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove weak references in skeleton reference cache. #61608
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update PublishData.json #61632
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Snap 17.3 P2 #61618
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61621
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update config file for 17.3 P2 snapping #61619
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61622
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add an option to control if compilations are cloned when making skeletons #61613
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Semantic Snippets - Remove reflection and call the LanguageServerSnippetExpander directly #61491
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61617
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update 'Rename's commit behavior to be async. #61549
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • [LSP] Utilize list of all classification types + expose types to Razor #61395
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix cancellation leaks #20111
    Area-IDE, cla-already-signed
  • Report a warning for multiple matches for implicit interface implementation of static member #61607
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • Include local-functions in the go-to index. #61568
    Area-IDE
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61616
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
